description: The ACC segment contains patient information relative to an accident in which the patient has been involved.

1.name: Accident Date/Time
1.description: This field contains the date/time of the accident.

2.name: Accident Code
2.description: This field contains the type of accident. User-defined table 0050 - Accident code is used as the HL7 identifier for the user-defined table of values for this field. ICD accident codes are recommended.

3.name: Accident Location
3.description: This field contains the location of the accident.

4.name: Auto Accident State
4.description: This field specifies the state in which the auto accident occurred. (HCFA 1500 requirement.) Refer to user-defined table 0347 - Auto accident state for suggested values.

5.name: Accident Job Related Indicator
5.description: This field indicates if the accident was related to a job. Refer to HL7 table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values.
5.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

6.name: Accident Death Indicator
6.description: This field indicates whether or not a patient has died as a result of an accident. Refer to HL7 table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values.
6.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables
